prototype.commodities.tests
Class MovingAverageTriangle

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--prototype.commodities.tests.MovingAverage
        |
        +--prototype.commodities.tests.MovingAverageTriangle
public class MovingAverageTriangle
extends MovingAverage

MovingAverageTriangle calculates the moving average on a set of data. The sourceMap that is passed to MovingAverageTriangle must be of date/Double values in ascending order by date. MovingAverageTriangle will then traverse the sourceMap to determine the moving average for a given date or for the entire range.

Author:
J.R. Titko
